title: Getting Started
description: Install and render your first ReactiveImage.
body: const{Fragment:t,jsx:e,jsxs:n}=arguments[0],r=arguments[0].baseUrl;if(!r)throw new Error("Unexpected missing `options.baseUrl` needed to support `export … from`, `import`, or `import.meta.url` when generating `function-body`");const{ReactiveImage:o}=await import(function(t){if("string"!=typeof t)return t;try{return new URL(t),t}catch{}return t.startsWith("/")||t.startsWith("./")||t.startsWith("../")?new URL(t,r).href:t}("reactive-image"));function _createMdxContent(r){const a={h1:"h1",...r.components};return n(t,{children:[e(a.h1,{children:"Getting Started"}),"\n",e(o,{src:"/img/a.jpg",alt:"demo",variant:"zoomOnHover",zoomScale:1.15})]})}return{default:function(t={}){const{wrapper:n}=t.components||{};return n?e(n,{...t,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...t})}):_createMdxContent(t)}};

title: Başlangıç
